TopicTitle: Looking for 0.90 Communication dishes to place on satellites

Articles.Content:
I'm sure there's already mods out there that have what I'm looking for. I'm running 0.90 and I want to make some Satellites. I can't seem to find any opening communication dishes that I can place on the satellites?

Does anyone have some recommendations

Thanks?

Keith

Ottawa, Canada

Try the dishes from RemoteTech2, even if you don't like the functionality of the mod, there is a link to a cfg on the first post that allow you to use them as stock. There are also very nice satellite dishes called ORIGAMI, and it still works in 0.90 with RT2. But if you want to use it as stock, you gotta write your own cfg for them.
There is also AIES has some dishes http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35383-0-23-AIES-Aerospace-v1-5-1
The FASA pack includes a very small folding dish and a retractable helical antenna.
